author: Source: Knutsford Guardian
title: Vampire Diaries hunk Ian Somerhalder strips off for new season 7 trailer - Knutsford Guardian
text:
Ian Somerhalder, star of The Vampire Diaries, has sparked fan frenzy by posting a new trailer for season 7 which shows off his toned, taut body. The handsome actor took to his Instagram account to give aficionados a sneak peek at the upcoming season, airing soon on ITV2.
 Knutsford Guardian.
